title: Nemesis

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose someone to Mock. They will not act tonight, and instead you do their action for them.
- During the day, select a trick to enhance your night ability.
1. Sneak: When Mocking, you perform the ability astrally and refill your Auto-Vest if it's depleted.
2. Change of Plans: You may select a second target at night. You instead perform the Mocked ability on that target.
3. Steal: Gain 1 charge of the ability you Mock tonight, which you can use whenever you wish.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and Control immunity
- You learn who you visit and what action you do

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to see two people you've Mocked get hanged

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4435
*The Nemesis was vile. Hatred was simply part of her system. There was no 'good' way to release it; life as a servant does not let you be angry. When she was ordered to perform menial tasks, a silent putrid ooze of odium was in every movement of her hand.*
